text: Group B of the UEFA Euro 2012 began on June 9, 2012 and ended on June 17, 2012. The group had the teams of Denmark, Germany, Netherlands and Portugal. Germany and Portugal went to the quarter-finals. The group was named the "Group of death," because the teams were in the top 10 in the FIFA World Rankings at the start of the games. == Table == Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 5 2 +3 9 3 2 0 1 5 4 +1 6 3 1 0 2 4 5 –1 3 3 0 0 3 2 5 –3 0 == Games == === Netherlands vs Denmark === === Germany vs Portugal === === Denmark vs Portugal === === Netherlands vs Germany === === Portugal vs Netherlands === === Denmark vs Germany === == Statistics == === Top scorer === * Mario Gómez (3 goals) == Other websites == *UEFA Euro 2012 Group B Category:UEFA Euro 2012
title: UEFA Euro 2012 Group B
